data.innerHTML: Welcome!

The starter template provides simplified versions of a theme, site navigation, and a default site so you can more easily modify it to create your own template.
 
Explore the pages in this site to learn more about developing the different parts of a template. To view a particular page:
  • Use the site navigation at the top of each page to go to a selected page.
  • Click Edit and then click the Pages icon in the left panel to use the site tree to go to a selected page.
To remove the documentation pages from this site, click the Developing Templates page in the site tree in the left panel and click the Delete icon. The Developing Templates page and all nested pages are deleted.
 
For more information about developing templates, see Developing Templates.
data.userText:
The starter template provides simplified versions of a theme, site navigation, and a default site so you can more easily modify it to create your own template.
 
Explore the pages in this site to learn more about developing the different parts of a template. To view a particular page:
  • Use the site navigation at the top of each page to go to a selected page.
  • Click Edit and then click the Pages icon in the left panel to use the site tree to go to a selected page.
To remove the documentation pages from this site, click the Developing Templates page in the site tree in the left panel and click the Delete icon. The Developing Templates page and all nested pages are deleted.
 
For more information about developing templates, see Developing Templates.
